label: A2B_mP6_10_mn_bc-001
title: $\delta$-Pd$_{2}$Cl Structure
comments:
PdCl$_{2}$ is known to exist in four different structures at ambient pressure (Evers, 2010): \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP6_58_g_a-001}{orthorhombic $\alpha$-PdCl$_{2}$}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_hR18_148_2f_f-001}{rhombohedral $\beta$-PdCl$_{2}$}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP6_14_e_a-001}{monoclinic $\gamma$-PdCl$_{2}$} , and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP6_10_mn_bc-001}{monoclinic $\delta$-PdCl$_{2}$} (this structure). \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 (Evers, 2010) use the unique-axis c setting of space group $P2/m$ \#10.  We have switched this to our standard unique-axis b setting.  Data was taken at 793K.
